attributes.additional_details: This is a petition to save our danson festival after Bexley council have decided to pull the plug on our much loved 2 day summer event , but they allow a firework display in the wet and cold month of November , it's the Peoples event not the Bexley boroughs , all this is down to is Bexley council cutting back !! Ie selling of open green spaces etc , I am very passionate about this event , it attracts over 60k visitors over the 2 day event bring all community's and family's together in a multicultural atmosphere , SAVE OUR DANSON FESTIVAL

rejection.details:
This is a matter that only the local council can deal with.

However, perhaps your MP would be interested in helping any campaign, as well as the local press?
